statements: DELETE FROM cyberbullying_incidents WHERE bully_name = 'John Doe' AND incident_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM evidence_storage WHERE storage_location = 'Cloud Storage';
DELETE FROM cyberbullying_incidents WHERE incident_id = 1001 AND victim_name = 'Alice';
DELETE FROM evidence_storage WHERE storage_location = 'Locker A' AND retention_policy = '1 year';
DELETE FROM report_status WHERE report_id = 10 AND status = 'closed';
DELETE FROM reported_person WHERE person_age > 18 AND person_gender = 'Female';
